mapper.insert: insert into tb_todo ( todo_id, todo, due_date, user_id ) values ( seq_todo.nextval, #{todo}, #{due_date}, #{user_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum AS rnum, todo_id, todo, due_date, done_date, u.user_id, u.name FROM tb_todo t LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_user u on(u.user_id = t.user_id) ) WHERE rnum >= #{startNum} AND rnum <= #{endNum}
select todo_id, todo, due_date, done_date, user_id from tb_todo where todo_id = #{todo_id}
